noscript.div: You may be trying to access this site from a secured browser on the server. Please enable scripts and reload this page.

input.name: __VIEWSTATE
__EVENTVALIDATION
input.script: var submitHook = function () { return false; }; theForm._spOldSubmit = theForm.submit; theForm.submit = function () { if (!submitHook()) { this._spOldSubmit(); } };

menuitem.description: View all libraries and lists in this site.

a.title: Settings
a.span: Use SHIFT+ENTER to open the menu (new window).

div.span: To navigate through the Ribbon, use standard browser navigation keys. To skip between groups, use Ctrl+LEFT or Ctrl+RIGHT. To jump to the first Ribbon tab use Ctrl+[. To jump to the last selected command use Ctrl+]. To activate a command, use Enter.

a.title: Browse
a.onkeydown: if(event != null && event.keyCode == 13){ if(typeof(_ribbon) != 'undefined') _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = true; _ribbonStartInit('Ribbon.Read',false, event); }

a.title: Page
a.onkeydown: if(event != null && event.keyCode == 13){ if(typeof(_ribbon) != 'undefined') _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = true; _ribbonStartInit('Ribbon.WebPartPage',false, event); }

a.title: Follow this site and get back to it easily from your sites page.

span.title: South Central School District 26-5, 401 Birdsell Street, Bonesteel, SD 57317 - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

h2.span: South Central School District 26-5, 401 Birdsell Street, Bonesteel, SD 57317

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; font-size: 15pt;

h2.span: 2019 Yearbooks for sale in Business Office $15.00/each

span.title: ---- Phone: (605) 654-2314 Fax: (605) 654-2348 - Use to display a slideshow of images and photos from a picture library.
Non Discrimination Policy - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

font.span: Title VI, Title IX and Section 504 Compliance Notice

Students, their parents and employees of the South Central School District #26-5 are hereby notified that this school district does not discriminate and is required by Title VI, Title IX, and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act not to discriminate on the basis of race, gender, color, national origin, age, religion, disability, or sexual orientation in its educational activities and employment practices. The school counselor and superintendent are designated program coordinators.Questions should be addressed to the superintendent. You may contact the
South Dakota Regional US Office for Civil Rights;
U.S. Department of Education, One Petticoat Lane, 1010 Walnut Street, 3
See page 20 of the student handbook for more information.
